Atreides.name: Trooper
Atreides.desc: Troopers are fierce melee fighters. They become stronger when supported by specialized units.

Atreides.name: Ranger
Atreides.desc: Armed with medium-range projectile weapons, rangers are best used alongside defensive units that can protect them.

Atreides.name: Heavy Weapon Squad
Atreides.desc: Equipped with rocket launchers, these specialists can easily breach enemy defenses and open the way for other units.

Atreides.name: Support Drone
Atreides.desc: This heavy, remote-controlled drone is well suited for combat, but its primary purpose is to provide field support to nearby units.

Atreides.name: Warden
Atreides.desc: The Wardens are the Atreides' elite section. Equipped with heavy-duty armor, shields and swords, they are ready to give their lives to defend their allies.

Harkonnen.name: Trooper
Harkonnen.desc: These rank and file troops are widely used by the Harkonnens, with little regard for their survival as long as they can further their goals.

Harkonnen.name: Gunner
Harkonnen.desc: These Harkonnen specialists use demolition charges and various explosives to stun and disorient their targets, reducing their efficiency.

Harkonnen.name: Cerberus
Harkonnen.desc: A special section of Harkonnen fanatics, trained from birth to value success at all costs over survival.

Harkonnen.name: Combat Probe
Harkonnen.desc: This lightweight, remote-controlled flying device is outfitted with small-caliber guns to assist other units in combat. Thanks to its small stature and reduced noise, it has the ability to stay concealed from a distance.

Harkonnen.name: Executioner
Harkonnen.desc: These hulking killing machines, clad in heavy armor and equipped with ever-regenerating shields, feel seemingly impossible to take down, although they are not fully invulnerable.

Fremen.name: Warrior
Fremen.desc: These Fremen fighters are adept at maintaining a high efficiency in the harsh, arid environments of Arrakis. Dune is their homeworld, and they will always defend it.

Fremen.name: Skirmisher
Fremen.desc: This demolition squad specializes in destroying enemy vehicles.

Fremen.name: Infiltrator
Fremen.desc: Stealthy units specializing in melee combat, able to exploit weaknesses in the enemies' armor and striking where it hurts most.

Fremen.name: Mobile Turret
Fremen.desc: Fremen had to adapt their strategies to fight increasingly armored invaders. A small team wielding stolen offworld artillery can wreak havoc into enemies' air units, while remaining discret and fast enough to evade the retribution.

Fremen.name: Fedaykin
Fremen.desc: The elite Fremen warriors are completely fearless and dreaded by all. No unit is better fitted for skirmishes in the desert, even when grossly outnumbered.

Fremen.name: Altar
Fremen.desc: Made from odds and end of many ships, this aeronef can be customized to meet the needs of its makers.

Smugglers.name: Scavenger
Smugglers.desc: Scavengers will offer their services to the highest bidder. This doesn't mean they are devoid of all ethics, but it certainly means that their loyalty has a cost and no strings attached.

Smugglers.name: Wrecker
Smugglers.desc: Plunderers who specialize in the use of drugs and chemical weapons, not only damaging enemy units, but also spoiling their supplies and poisoning their food.

Smugglers.name: Sniper
Smugglers.desc: These lightweight units know when to strike. Their specialty is ambushing units stranded in the desert and already in a bad spot.

Smugglers.name: Scavenging Drone
Smugglers.desc: These remote-controlled utility machines will help gather lost equipment on the battlefield, and turn them into useful weapons.

Smugglers.name: Free Company
Smugglers.desc: Highly trained warriors and assassins, using stealth to strike when one least expects them.

Corrino.name: Conscript Swordman
Corrino.desc: Conscripts are fierce fighters. They become stronger when supported by specialized units.

Corrino.name: Conscript Rifleman
Corrino.desc: Conscripts are fierce fighters. They become stronger when supported by specialized units.

Corrino.name: Incinerator
Corrino.desc: These shock troops are equipped with a device that throws burning napalm. This terrible weapon brings agonizing death to its target and awful nightmares to those who see it in action.

Corrino.name: Artillery Drone
Corrino.desc: Once stabilized, these remote-controlled mobile artilleries rain deafening shells on even well-defended positions. Make sure to keep the enemy away from them, as they are quite vulnerable at close range.

Corrino.name: Sardaukar
Corrino.desc: Elite troops of the Empire, the Sardaukar are widely considered the best fighters in the universe.

Ecaz.name: Squire
Ecaz.desc: The squires have sworn to serve Ecazi nobility. They are used to taking the biggest blows from enemy forces, and focus on softening defences for stronger units to steal the show.

Ecaz.name: Musketeer
Ecaz.desc: [Ecaz-longname] employs a lot of professional hunters, to keep the large game population of their home planet in check, feed the court, and provide diversion. During war times, they are often hired to chase a very different quarry.

Ecaz.name: Fencer
Ecaz.desc: Fencers trained all day, every day to be the best duelist in the universe. On the battlefield, they often take the heat off of their lesser peers.

Ecaz.name: War Banner
Ecaz.desc: A good banner is not just a piece of fabric. It's an embodiement of everything one fights for. As long as the War Banner stands, [Ecaz-longname]'s unique blend of style and honor shall be felt by all on the battlefield.

Ecaz.name: Knight
Ecaz.desc: Ecazi nobility prides itself on its bravery and martial prowess. It is customary for young nobles to follow the path of the knight, to demonstrate in the fray that they indeed possess such qualities.

Vernius.name: Fighting Mek
Vernius.desc: Self-learning combat drones using a shifting repertoire of deadly moves. First designed to train the Ixian nobility in close combat, the fighting meks have been increasingly integrated into Vernius military forces.

Vernius.name: Suboid Soldier
Vernius.desc: Suboids are a race of humans genetically designed for manual labor. They are diligent and methodical, but lack any capacity for imagination and creativity. They can occasionally participate in warfare when the need arises.

Vernius.name: Railgun Drone
Vernius.desc: Railgun Drones fire a projectile accelerated with an electromagnetic coil. These high-tech weapons can reach marginally better projectile speeds than regular firearms, if the cannon is long enough.

Vernius.name: Resonance Drone
Vernius.desc: The Resonance Drone induces a self-repeating electrical feedback loop in its Holtzman Coil, charging nearby Faraday cages with a powerful electrostatic effect. This stratagem has been used by Ixian armies for centuries.

Vernius.name: Fight-Engineer
Vernius.desc: Fight-Engineers are a caste of Ixian specialists constantly trying to improve the programming of fighting drones. They often appear on the front, where they can provide emergency repairs or take direct control of the drone army.
